preface.para: &productname; is a minimalistic operating system designed to make it simple to build and run &kube; clusters. &productname; allows for the provisioning, management and scaling of container-based applications. It is optimized for large, clustered deployments.

&kube; is an orchestration framework that is used to to optimize the use of containers. It provides a platform for automating the deployment, scaling and operations of pods of containers across multiple nodes in a cluster.

listitem.para: optimization of hardware by using only the required resources.
